text: During a trip to Iraq last fall, I visited our theater hospital at Balad Air Force Base and witnessed these skilled medical professionals in action and met the brave soldiers whose lives they saved.
author: Melissa Bean

text: If we don't change, millions of American families are just one medical emergency, or one layoff, away from financial disaster and bankruptcy.
author: Jim Cooper

text: When I took command in Vietnam, I gave great emphasis to food and medical care - and to the mail.
author: William Westmoreland

text: In my second year, after moving to the Medical School, I began the courses of Anatomy and Physiology. I had begun to see that I was interested in cells and their functions.
author: Sydney Brenner

text: As a player, I was fortunate to work with coaching and medical staffs that underscored the importance of utilizing injury prevention exercises, which contributed to my healthy and long playing career.
author: Cobi Jones
